page.title: 01Marginal land SW of Kington
page.content: This is predominantly an agricultural area which comes into the marginal or less favoured categories. The farming remains fairly traditionl with conservation being of importance to the inhabitants. There are about 14 farms in this block of varying size. The fourth generation of the Jones family are now farming Lower House They are the only milk producers in the area ad have their own bottling plant and retail round which provides important employ_ ment for local people. In the North East corner towards Kington there is an old military hospital which was built during the war. Some of it is now used for various types of storage,including fuel, garaging, a poultry unit and a Pig Unit.
